name: MBS (Monster Bomb Squad) FK
additionalNotes: The MBS FK is a new extension to Tatuaje’s incredibly popular Monster Series, a 4 x 50 that is based off of The Krueger release from 2016. That means it uses a Mexican San Andrés wrapper atop a Nicaraguan double binder and filler. As for the MBS part of the name, that stands for Monster Bomb Squad.
